articles.title: The first carbon dioxide cold trap on the moon was confirmed-Mis-aisa-The - MIS Asia
articles.description: According to a recent report by the physicist organization network, after decades of research, American scientists have confirmed for the first time that there is a cold trap that may contain solid carbon dioxide on the moon.

articles.author: Eryn Murphy
articles.title: 2021 American Music Awards: Becky G Called BTS Her 'Homies' - Showbiz Cheat Sheet
articles.description: At the 2021 American Music Awards, Becky G called the members of BTS her 'homies' and shared she wants to see the band's upcoming LA concert.
articles.content: There is nothing sweeter than a celebrity friendship. The 2021 American Music Awards took place on Nov. 21. At the award show, Becky G reunited with Jin, Suga, J-Hope, RM, Jimin, V, and Jungkook of B… [+2866 chars]

articles.title: Shake the habit of spending too long sitting, your mental health will thank you - Malay Mail
articles.description: NEW YORK, Nov 26 — During the Covid-19 pandemic, restrictive measures like lockdowns, curfews and stay-at-home orders often made our lifestyles more sedentary. But, according to an American study, sitting for too long can increase the risk of depression and a…
articles.content:
Scientists find that sitting more is linked to increased feelings of depression and anxiety. Picture courtesy of eclipse_images / Getty Images
